message.body: Gonna be a little bit late
I forgot to mention it but it would be helpful if you spray some water in those pockets before putting the mortar in there. It will help it bond.
Water on the bricks for a better bond. That makes sense. I checked out the craigslist sink and basin and emailed both parties. Considering lowes showers.
Gotta get online for my banking but I'll have the material fees together to accompany your work. Thanks again.
